title: Straight Up
description: I went from a penthouse to sleeping in a prison cell.From the VP of a million-dollar empire to a felon.All for a crime I didn’t commit.Now that I’m free, I vow to stay out of trouble.Then she walks in.The mayor’s daughter.My new co-worker.The only problem? She’s trouble wrapped in a bow.I swore not to cross that line.But one moment of weakness changes everything.And now, there’s no going back.
author: Charity Ferrell
